Smokescreen/Dark One/Pyro/Hiss:


Smokescreen saw the bridge door close, he opened it, charging into the Ark's 
bridge, firing three shots at Set's back with his electro-disruptor rifle 
(basically like EMP only in a condensed beam).

=========

Dark One barrel rolled, a shot of Ramulus' shots blowing off a left back 
dorsal fin of his, though it didn't hurt the flight process that much.  
Recieving Zardus com, he smild internally.  <I-KSSSSH-ear you, weapon fire 
in-KSSSSH-ing co-KSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSH> he chuckled madly after he ended the 
comlink, rolling in the sky, firing a missile down at Ursa Major as the shots 
passed by in hi space fighrer mode.

---

Pyro chuckled madly, twirling his cannon in an arm, a continuous burst of 
flames heading for Ramulus and Ursa Major.

---

Hiss took aim, firing two fusion blasts at Ursa Major.
